title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy: Ethical Leadership and Organizational Learning Innovation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of ethical leadership on organizations and suggest implementation plans according to learning types
Based on practical cases, learners can explain the mechanisms by which ethical leadership promotes exploratory/exploitative learning
Learners can understand the concept of work centrality and establish strategies to enhance organizational learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
